message:
<system-reminder>
✔️ SUBTASK COMPLETED - NEXT:
💡 GREAT: Insights documented for future reference
🔄 CHECK: Review if parent task needs updating
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📊 TASK UPDATED - REMINDERS:
⏰ REMINDER: Continue updating every 25% progress
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
🤖 AGENT LOADED - READY:
🎯 ORCHESTRATOR LOADED: You can now coordinate all work
📋 START: List existing tasks or create new ones
⚠️ REMEMBER: This was a one-time load - don't call again this session
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📋 TASK CREATED - NEXT STEPS:
✅ NEXT STEP: Delegate to agent using Task tool with task_id only
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📋 TASK CREATED - NEXT STEPS:

</system-reminder>

</system-reminder>

</system-reminder>

</system-reminder>
